content: **this super cute hat should fit most any 10 doll with a 8 75 - 10 head circumference it is created by working top down using mainstays leftover yarn but feel free to use whatever ww4/aran/10 ply yarn you have on hand as long as you can achieve the finished size of approximately 4 5 wide at the opening and 3 tall this pattern does include instructions for adapting the pattern for larger sizes if needed but the stretch of the band helps to cover a wide variety of dolls ** check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peeks free patterns & sales https //www reginapdesigns com/ if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/ ***materials *** mainstays yarn approx 25 yds h 5 mm hook scissors needle ***abbreviations us terms *** skip = skip sts = stitches st = stitch sl= slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet fbl = front bottom loop fp = front post bp = back post from these patterns with the agreement that regina p designs will be credited for the pattern itself return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final if you have a problem with working out parts of a pattern please contact the designer for help
